Cosmic Order.quote: "The universe is not a chaos, but a harmony of ordered movements." (Pythagoras)

Natural Law.quote: "Rita - the cosmic order and moral law that governs all existence." (Rig Veda 1.164)

Divine Hierarchy.quote: "There are celestial bodies and earthly bodies, but the glory of the celestial is one, and the glory of the terrestrial is another." (1 Corinthians 15:40)

Sacred Structure.quote: "As above, so below; as below, so above." (Hermes Trismegistus, The Emerald Tablet)

Celestial Order.quote: "The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands." (Psalm 19:1)

Universal Pattern.quote: "The Tao follows what is natural." (Tao Te Ching, Chapter 25)

Divine Harmony.quote: "Everything in the universe follows order and harmony." (Confucius, Analects)

Sacred Balance.quote: "In perfect equilibrium, heaven and earth are aligned." (I Ching)

Spiritual Hierarchy.quote: "From angels to archangels, from seraphim to cherubim, all serve in divine order." (Pseudo-Dionysius, Celestial Hierarchy)

Cosmic Structure.quote: "The cosmos is structured in ascending levels of consciousness." (Plotinus, Enneads)

Divine Architecture.quote: "God has arranged all things by measure and number and weight." (Wisdom 11:20)

Divine System.quote: "Everything proceeds according to the law of cause and effect." (Buddha)

Universal Order.quote: "The whole universe is strung on Me, as pearls are strung on a thread." (Bhagavad Gita 7:7)

Metaphysical Structure.quote: "All things are arranged hierarchically, from the First Cause through all gradations of creation." (Thomas Aquinas)

Divine Organization.quote: "Let all things be done decently and in order." (1 Corinthians 14:40)

Sacred Order.quote: "The order of the sacred manifests in all dimensions of existence." (Mircea Eliade)

Cosmic Harmony.quote: "Heaven and Earth unite in perfect order to make all things manifest." (I Ching, Hexagram 11)

Divine Plan.quote: "In all things God works for the good of those who love him." (Romans 8:28)

Sacred Pattern.quote: "The patterns of the divine are woven through all of creation." (Ibn Arabi)

Divine Arrangement.quote: "Everything has been created according to a measure." (Quran 54:49)

Celestial Hierarchy.quote: "The celestial orders mirror the divine intelligence." (Maimonides, Guide for the Perplexed)

Sacred Mathematics.quote: "Numbers are the highest degree of knowledge. It is knowledge itself." (Plato)

Divine Sequence.quote: "From the One proceeds the many in perfect sequence." (Plotinus)

Cosmic Design.quote: "The universe shows evidence of a calculating creator." (Sir Isaac Newton)

Sacred Science.quote: "The laws of nature are but the mathematical thoughts of God." (Euclid)

Divine Symmetry.quote: "Symmetry is what we see at a glance." (Blaise Pascal)

Universal Law.quote: "The same patterns move through all things." (Marcus Aurelius, Meditations)
